snippet: President Enrique Peña Nieto described the outline of a sweeping plan intended to collect billions of dollars to finance new social programs.
abstract: Mexican Pres Enrique Pena Nieto proposes sweeping overhaul of country's tax system, intended to collect billions of dollars to finance new social programs.
lead_paragraph: President Enrique Peña Nieto described the outline of a sweeping plan intended to collect billions of dollars to finance new social programs.

headline.main: President of Mexico Proposes Tax Overhaul
headline.print_headline: President Of Mexico Proposes Tax Overhaul
